class surepy.data.hulls.Bounding_box(points)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class with bounding box computed using the shapely method.

class surepy.data.hulls.Convex_hull_scipy(points)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class with convex hull computed using the scipy.spatial.ConvexHull method.

Parameters:

points (ndarray of double, shape (npoints, ndim)) – Coordinates of input points.
Variables:
  • hull (hull object) – hull object from the corresponding algorithm
  • vertex_indices (indices for points) – indices identifying a polygon of all points that make up the hull
  • dimension (int) – spatial dimension of hull
  • width (array-like of float) – length in x, y[, and z]-dimension of aligned hulls or max length of oriented hulls
  • region_measure (float) – hull measure, i.e. area or volume
  • subregion_measure (float) – measure of the sub-dimensional region, i.e. circumference or surface

Bases: object

Abstract class for the hull of a selection

Parameters:

points (array-like of tuples with floats) – coordinates of points for which the hull is computed
Variables:

  • vertex_indices (indices for points) – indices identifying a polygon of all points that make up the hull
  • dimension (int) – spatial dimension of hull
  • width (array-like of float) – length in x, y[, and z]-dimension of aligned hulls or max length of oriented hulls
  • region_measure (float) – hull measure, i.e. area or volume
  • subregion_measure (float) – measure of the sub-dimensional region, i.e. circumference or surface
